TopicTitle: Forums no longer tracking read/unread posts?

Articles.Content:
Not a big issue, but I thought I'd report it.

When I'm browsing the forums, it used to track what I had and hadn't read quite well. If I reloaded the thread list after finishing a thread, it would correctly mark that thread as having no new posts.

Now, it doesn't seem to, and I can finish reading a thread, reload the list and it still shows new unread posts, even when there aren't any.

Browser: Chrome for iOS

OS: iPhone - iOS 8.1.1

Didn't notice if the behavior changed on my PC, I will update this post when I get home.
The behaviour has always been erratic at best. It's usually fine, but every now and again it just goes haywire for no apparent reason. There's not much we can do, unfortunately. :/
i couldn't tell if this was really happening or if i was imagining things.
Yeah, it throws me for a loop every now and again. XD
